duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and present lead technical viewpoint on projects and ensure standardized delivery of design using KIE systems.
Prepare construction documents and detailed calculations for HVAC and plumbing systems.
Review RFP documents, estimate mechanical systems, and write system narratives for project proposals.
Create cost-effective designs for building mechanical systems to win profitable work.
Coordinate with sub-consultants, perform project work planning, and scheduling.
Assist in promotion, discipline, performance review, work allocation, training, and mentoring of staff.
